bandages.name: Bandages
bandages.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Crew members you revive get an additional 15% health.
ACE: 4 points	You get an additional 20% health after being revived.

company_soul.name: Company Soul
company_soul.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Crew members you revive take 10% less damage for 5 seconds and get an additional 5% health.
ACE: 3 points	You and your crew's stamina is increased by 50%.

painkillers.name: Painkillers
painkillers.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Crew members you revive take an additional 40% less damage for 5 seconds.
ACE: 4 points	You take 50% less damage for 5 seconds after being revived.

keepers.name: Keepers
keepers.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now deploy 2 Doctor Bags instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Your doctor bags have 1 more charge.

combat_doctor.name: Combat Doctor
combat_doctor.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You gain a 40% damage reduction for 5 seconds both after and during revivng a teammate.
ACE: 6 points	Upon reviving a crew member you gain a 25% damage bonus for 10 seconds.
You revive crew members 33% faster.

inspire.name: Inspire
inspire.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Shouting at your teammates within a 7m range will increase their movement and reload speed by 30% for 7 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	You can now revive your teammates within a 7m range by shouting at them. This cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds.

forced_friendship.name: Forced Friendship
forced_friendship.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increase your supply of cable ties by 4.
You can now cable tie hostages 25% faster.
ACE: 3 points	You can now have an additional hostage following you at the same time.

hostage_situation.name: Hostage Situation
hostage_situation.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Trading a hostage for resources will now restore the equivalent of 4 ammo box pickups into the reserves of every player in your team.
You can now trade for resources regardless of whether your team is missing any downs.
ACE: 6 points	Trading a hostage for resources will now delay the incoming assault by 10 seconds. This effect is doubled for solo players.
You can now trade hostages for resources before the first assault.

joker.name: Joker
joker.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can now convert a non-special enemy to fight on your side.
Your converted enemy deals 35% more damage and takes 50% less damage.
ACE: 4 points	Your converted enemy now takes an additional 25% less damage.

control_freak.name: Control Freak
control_freak.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The power and range of your intimidation is increased by 50%
ACE: 4 points	Civilians are intimidated by the noise you make and remain intimidated 50% longer.
Nearby untied civilians have a chance of reviving you if you interact with them.

partners_in_crime.name: Partners in Crime
partners_in_crime.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your converted enemy is 15% more likely to be targeted when close to you or your crew.
ACE: 6 points	Your converted enemy counts towards hostage related bonuses.

hostage_taker.name: Hostage Taker
hostage_taker.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You regenerate up to 8 health every 5 seconds for having at least 1 hostage.
Health regenerated is divided by the amount of hostages equivalent to the team's size.
ACE: 8 points	The amount of health you regenerate is increased by 50% when you are within 7m of a hostage.

stable_shot.name: Stable Shot
stable_shot.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Your weapons gain 4 accuracy.
ACE: 3 points	The time it takes for your aim to recenter after your last shot is reduced by 50%.

rifleman.name: Rifleman
rifleman.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You snap to zoom 25% faster.
ACE: 4 points	Your weapons are 20% more accurate while standing still.
rifleman.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.	Every 25 points of stamina consumed by dashing will refill 5% of their ammo pool to single shot weapons.	ACE: The improved accuracy lasts from 1 up to a maximum of 5 seconds after dashing.

marksman.name: Marksman
marksman.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your aimpunch is reduced by 20% when aiming down sights.
ACE: 4 points	Your weapon recoil is reduced by 20% while aiming down sights.

ammo_efficiency.name: Ammo Efficiency
ammo_efficiency.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Getting 3 headshots in less than 6 seconds will refund 1 bullet to your used weapon. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.
ACE: 6 points	The amount of headshots required is reduced to 2.

kilmer.name: Kilmer
kilmer.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You reload your Sniper and Assault Rifles 25% faster.
ACE: 6 points	Any killing headshot will increase your reload speed by 40% for 6 seconds. Can only be triggered by SMGs, Assault Rifles and Sniper Rifles fired in single shot fire mode.

headshot_fury.name: Headshot Fury
headshot_fury.description:
BASIC: 4 points	For every consecutive headshot with your Sniper Rifle, your next shot's damage is increased by 20%.	Stacks up to 5 consecutive headshots.
Missing a headshot resets your stacks.
ACE: 8 points	While aiming down the sights with your Sniper Rifle, a charge meter builds up over a period of 3 seconds. When fully charged, your next headshot becomes explosive, dealing up to 100% of the bullet's damage in a 5m radius around the bullet impact and discharging the meter.
Leaving the ADS stance or firing the weapon during the charging process resets the meter.

fast_hands.name: Fast Hands
fast_hands.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You reload Individually-Loaded Shotguns 25% faster.
ACE: 4 points	Your rate of fire is increased by 25% while firing from the hip with single-shot Shotguns.

mag_fed_specialist.name: Mag-fed Specialist
mag_fed_specialist.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You reload Mag-fed & Double Barrel Shotguns 25% faster.
ACE: 6 points	Your Mag-fed Shotguns have their magazine size increased by 5 shells.

shotgun_rampage.name: Shotgun Rampage
shotgun_rampage.description:
BASIC: 4 points	For every kill with a Shotgun, you gain a 6% movement speed boost that lasts for 5 seconds.	Stacks up to 5 times.
ACE: 8 points	When killing an enemy with a shotgun, you have a 75% chance to cause nearby enemies to panic.	Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
This cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.

resilience.name: Resilience
resilience.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increases your armor recovery rate by 10%.
ACE: 3 points	Reduces the visual effect duration of Flashbangs by 50%.

thick_skin.name: Thick Skin
thick_skin.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You gain 10% extra health.
ACE: 6 points	You gain an additional 20% extra health.

plates_of_steel.name: Plates of Steel
plates_of_steel.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your steadiness is increased by 15.	Higher steadiness reduces aimpunch.
ACE: 4 points	Increases the armor of all ballistic vests by 20.

underdog.name: Underdog
underdog.description:
BASIC: 1 points	When three or more enemies within 18 meters are targeting you, you receive a 15% damage bonus that lasts for 7 seconds.
ACE: 3 points	When three or more enemies within 18 meters are targeting you, you also receive a 10% damage reduction that lasts for 7 seconds.
Note: Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.

pack_mule.name: Pack Mule
pack_mule.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can now sprint with all bags.
ACE: 4 points	You can now carry 2 bags at the same time.

wip3.name: Work in Progress
wip3.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Work in progress.
ACE: 6 points	Work in progress.

iron_man.name: Iron Man
iron_man.description:
BASIC: 4 points	When you melee shield enemies, they get knocked back by the sheer force.	Your ranged weapons have a chance of knocking down shields as well.
ACE: 8 points	Unlocks the Improved Combined Tactical Vest for you to wear.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Your ammo pickup rate is increased by 5%.
ACE: 3 points	Your ammo pick up range is increased by 20%.

bulletstorm.name: Bulletstorm
bulletstorm.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Ammo bags placed by you grant players the ability to shoot without depleting their ammunition for up to 12 seconds after interacting with it. The more ammo players replenish, the longer the duration of the effect.
ACE: 8 points	Increases the base duration of the effect by up to 30 seconds.

portable_saw.name: Portable Saw
portable_saw.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Unlocks the OVE9000 portable saw for you to use as a secondary weapon.
ACE: 4 points	You gain 1 extra saw blade for the OVE9000 portable saw. You replace your saw blades with carbon blades, increasing your saw efficiency by 60%.

saw_massacre.name: Saw Massacre
saw_massacre.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The weardown of the saw blades on enemies is reduced by 90%.
ACE: 4 points	You can now saw through shield enemies with your OVE9000 portable saw. When killing an enemy with the saw, you have a 50% chance to cause nearby enemies in a 10m radius to panic.	Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.

extra_lead.name: Extra Lead
extra_lead.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now place 2 ammo bags instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Each ammo bag now contains 50% more ammunition.

mag_plus.name: Mag Plus
mag_plus.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Firing a weapon has a 5% chance to not consume any ammo.
ACE: 4 points	Your weapons gain 20% more rounds in their magazine.
Note: Does not affect the Aced "Sleight of Hand" Skill.

fully_loaded.name: Fully Loaded
fully_loaded.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You now carry 33% more throwables.
ACE: 4 points	Your total ammo capacity is increased by 25%.

big_game_hunters.name: Big Game Hunters
big_game_hunters.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Every 6th enemy you kill will drop an extra ammo box.
ACE: 6 points	Your ammo pickup rate is increased by an additional 25%.

transporter.name: Transporter
transporter.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You can pack and interact with loot bags 50% faster.
ACE: 3 points	You can throw bags 50% further.

daredevil.name: Daredevil
daredevil.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You interact with objects 10% faster.
ACE: 4 points	You take 35% less damage while interacting with objects.

defense_package.name: Defense Package
defense_package.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your sentry guns gain 150% increased health.
ACE: 4 points	Your sentry guns gain a protective shield.

jack_of_all_trades.name: Jack of All Trades
jack_of_all_trades.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You deploy and interact with all deployable 100% faster.
ACE: 6 points	You can now equip a secondary deployable to bring with you. If your deployable is equipped as a secondary deployable, you can only bring half of what you should bring if it was equipped as a primary deployable.

sentry_nest.name: Sentry Nest
sentry_nest.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now carry 1 extra sentry gun.
ACE: 6 points	The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by 25%. Your sentry guns also have 50% more ammunition.

phd_in_engineering.name: PHD in Engineering
phd_in_engineering.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your sentry guns now have an upgraded motion sensor, allowing them to mark all enemies in a 10m radius and giving them a 100% increase in accuracy.
ACE: 8 points	You can now toggle AP rounds on your sentry guns, lowering the rate of fire by 75%, but increasing damage by 250% and allowing it to pierce through enemies and shields.

hardware_expert.name: Hardware Expert
hardware_expert.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You fix drills and saws 25% faster. Decreases trip mine deploy time by 20%. Drills and saws are also silent. Civilians and guards must see the drill or saw in order to become alerted.
ACE: 3 points	Gives your drills and saws a 20% chance to automatically restart after breaking.
Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw.

combat_engineering.name: Combat Engineering
combat_engineering.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The radius of your trip mine explosion is increased by 50%.
ACE: 4 points	Your trip mine damage is increased by 50%.

drill_sawgeant.name: Drill Sawgeant
drill_sawgeant.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your drill and saw timer is decreased by 15%.
ACE: 4 points	Your drill and saw timer is decreased by an additional 15%.
Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw.

more_firepower.name: More Firepower
more_firepower.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You gain 2 more shaped charges and 5 more trip mines.
ACE: 6 points	You gain 3 more shaped charges and 10 more trip mines.

kickstarter.name: Kickstarter
kickstarter.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your drills and saws gain an additional 30% chance to automatically restart after breaking.
ACE: 6 points	Enables the ability to reset a broken drill or saw with a melee attack. The ability has a 50% chance to fix the drill or saw. The ability can only be used once per time the drill or saw is broken.
Note: Skill does not affect the OVE9000 saw.

fire_trap.name: Fire Trap
fire_trap.description:
BASIC: 4 points	Your trip mines now spread fire around the area of detonation for 20 seconds in a 4 meter diameter.
ACE: 8 points	Increases the fire effect duration by 20 seconds and increases the fire effect radius by 50%.

steady_grip.name: Steady Grip
steady_grip.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Your weapons gain 4 stability.
ACE: 3 points	Your moving recoil penalty is decreased by 20%.

oppressor.name: Oppressor
oppressor.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your weapons are 15% more effective at threatening enemies.
ACE: 4 points	Your weapons are additionally 30% more effective at threatening enemies.

fire_control.name: Fire Control
fire_control.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your hipfire spread penalty is decreased by 20%.
ACE: 4 points	The longer you hipfire without releasing the trigger, the more stable your LMGs, SMGs and Miniguns become.
Stacks up to a 50% recoil reduction.

sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
sleight_of_hand.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You reload your SMGs and LMGs 20% faster.
ACE: 6 points	Killing 2 enemies with SMGs, LMGs or Special Weapons set on automatic fire mode will increase your next reload speed by up to 100%. This bonus is reduced by 1% for each bullet above 20 in the total magazine size, down to a 40% reload speed increase.

lock_n_load.name: Lock N' Load
lock_n_load.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now hip-fire your weapons while sprinting.
ACE: 6 points	You no longer have a movement speed penalty when wielding Heavy Weaponry.

body_expertise.name: Body Expertise
body_expertise.description:
BASIC: 4 points	All of your ranged weapons can now pierce through enemy body armor.
Does not apply to throwable weapons.
ACE: 8 points	80% of the bonus from headshot damage is permanently applied to hitting enemies on the body.
This skill is only activated by SMGs fired in automatic mode, LMGs or Miniguns.

inner_pockets.name: Inner Pockets
inner_pockets.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Increases the concealment of melee weapons by 1.
ACE: 3 points	Increases the concealment of all ballistic vests by 3.

winston_wolfe.name: Winston Wolfe
winston_wolfe.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You gain 1 additional body bag in your inventory. Also increases the body bag inventory space to 3.
ACE: 4 points	You lockpick 50% faster.
You can now silently crack safes by hand.

ecm_feedback.name: ECM Feedback
ecm_feedback.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can now interact with ECM jammers to cause a feedback loop that stuns enemies.
Feedback loop has a 25m radius.	Obstructed line of sight halves the radius.
ACE: 4 points	ECM feedback now recharges every 2 minutes.

chameleon.name: Chameleon
chameleon.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Increases the time before you start getting detected by 35% in casing mode.
You are 35% less likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members in loud.
ACE: 6 points	Your concealment is increased by 5.

blackout.name: Blackout
blackout.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You gain the ability to disable 1 camera from detecting you and your crew. Effects last for 25 seconds.
ACE: 8 points	Your ECM jammer can now also be used to open certain electronic doors. Pagers are delayed by the ECM jammers.

ecm_specialist.name: ECM Specialist
ecm_specialist.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now place 2 ECM jammers instead of just one.
ACE: 6 points	Your ECM jammer and feedback now last 30 seconds.

athlete.name: Athlete
athlete.description:
BASIC: 1 point	The time before stamina regeneration starts is reduced by 25% and the regeneration rate of stamina is increased by 25%.
ACE: 3 points	Your total movement speed is increased by 10%.

duck_and_cover.name: Duck and Cover
duck_and_cover.description:
BASIC: 2 points	The regeneration rate of your stamina is increased by 33% while crouching.
ACE: 4 points	You gain a 10% chance to dodge enemy fire while crouching.

sprinter.name: Sprinter
sprinter.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You can now sprint while strafing and swapping weapons.
ACE: 4 points	You gain a 10% chance to dodge enemy fire while sprinting and zip-lining.

second_wind.name: Second Wind
second_wind.description:
BASIC: 3 points	When your armor breaks, your movement speed is increased by 20% for 5 seconds.
ACE: 6 points	You gain a 10% chance to dodge enemy fire when your armor is broken.
This cannot occur again for another 10 seconds after your armor regenerates.

shockproof.name: Shockproof
shockproof.description:
BASIC: 3 points	When tased, the shock effect will be 33% weaker.
You no longer randomly pull the trigger while being tased.
ACE: 6 points	When tased, you are able to free yourself from the taser by interacting with it within 2 seconds of getting tased.

sneaky_bastard.name: Sneaky Bastard
sneaky_bastard.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You gain a 1% chance to dodge for every 2 points of detection rate under 35 up to 10%.
ACE: 8 points	While your armor is broken, dodging will fully regenerate it.
This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

resilient_assault.name: Resilient Assault
resilient_assault.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You gain 5% critical hit chance.	Critical hits deal 200% damage.
ACE: 3 points	When your armor breaks, the first shot on every enemy will cause that enemy to stagger.
The effect persists for 3 seconds after your armor has recovered.

eagle_eye.name: Eagle Eye
eagle_eye.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You deal 10% more damage against special enemies.
ACE: 4 points	You can now mark specials by aiming down at them with any weapon.
The range at which you can manually mark enemies is 4 times longer.

the_professional.name: The Professional
the_professional.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You snap to zoom 25% faster with silenced weapons.
ACE: 4 points	You gain 1 concealment for each silenced weapon equipped. Reduce the concealment penalty of silencers by 2.
the_professional.vr_description: Addition in VR:	BASIC: Every kill while aiming down sight will regenerate 2% stamina.

silent_killer.name: Silent Killer
silent_killer.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Your silenced weapons gain 4 stability and accuracy, as well as a 30% chance to pierce enemy armor.
ACE: 6 points	Your silenced weapons gain a 15% damage increase.

high_value_target.name: High Value Target
high_value_target.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Enemies you mark take 20% more damage when farther away than 10 meters.
ACE: 6 points	Enemies you mark take 30% more damage at all ranges.	The marked state duration is increased by 100%.
Note: This effect is applied separately from the Basic version.

low_blow.name: Low Blow
low_blow.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You gain a 1% critical hit chance for every 2 points of detection rate under 35 up to 10%.
ACE: 8 points	You gain an additional 20% critical hit chance.
Critical hits now deal an additional 100% damage.

equilibrium.name: Equilibrium
equilibrium.description:
BASIC: 1 point	Decreases the time it takes to draw end holster pistols by 10%.
ACE: 3 points	You gain 8 weapon accuracy with all pistols.

gun_nut.name: Gun Nut
gun_nut.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your pistol magazine sizes are increased by 5 bullets.
ACE: 4 points	You gain a 50% increased rate of fire with pistols.

akimbo.name: Akimbo
akimbo.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by 8.
ACE: 4 points	Your Akimbo weapons' stability penalty is reduced by an additional 8 and they also have 50% increased ammo capacity.

one_handed_talent.name: One Handed Talent
one_handed_talent.description:
BASIC: 3 points	The base damage of all pistols is increased by 5.
ACE: 6 points	The base damage of all pistols is increased by an additional 10 damage.

desperado.name: Desperado
desperado.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Each successful pistol hit gives you a 10% accuracy bonus for 10 seconds and you can stack it 4 times.
ACE: 6 points	You reload all pistols 50% faster.

trigger_happy.name: Trigger Happy
trigger_happy.description:
BASIC: 4 points	For every hit with a pistol you gain a 15% damage boost that lasts for 3 seconds.	Stacks up to 5 times.
ACE: 8 points	You now gain a 37.5% damage boost for every hit and the damage boost lasts 6 seconds.	Stacks up to 2 times.

tough_guy.name: Tough Guy
tough_guy.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You can now use your steelsight while in bleedout.
ACE: 3 points	You can now swap your weapons while in bleedout.

quick_fix.name: Quick Fix
quick_fix.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Decreases your First Aid Kit and Doctor Bag deploy time by 100%.
ACE: 4 points	Crew members that use your First Aid Kits or Doctor Bags take 10% less damage for 120 seconds.

running_from_death.name: Running from Death
running_from_death.description:
BASIC: 2 points	You reload and swap weapons 100% faster for 10 seconds after being revived.
ACE: 4 points	You move 30% faster for 10 seconds after being revived.

uppers.name: Uppers
uppers.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Using a First Aid Kit makes you regenerate 10 health every 5 seconds for 60 seconds.
ACE: 6 points	Your deployed First Aid Kits will be automatically used if a player is downed within a 5 meter radius of the First Aid Kit. This cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds.

swan_song.name: Swan Song
swan_song.description:
BASIC: 3 points	Instead of getting downed instantly, you gain the ability to keep on fighting for 3 seconds with a 60% movement penalty before going down.
Note: Does not trigger on fall or fire damage.
ACE: 6 points	Increases the duration of Swan Song by 6 seconds.

messiah.name: Messiah
messiah.description:
BASIC: 4 points	While in bleedout, you can revive yourself if you kill an enemy. You only have 1 charge.
Your bleedout timer is increased by 10 seconds.
Note: Getting out of custody doesn't replenish the charges.
ACE: 8 points	You gain an additional 2 charges.
Whenever you get into custody, your hostages will trade themselves for your safe return. This effect can occur during assaults, but only 1 time during a heist.

martial_arts.name: Martial Arts
martial_arts.description:
BASIC: 1 point	You take 50% less damage from all melee attacks. Because of training.
ACE: 3 points	You are 50% more likely to knock down enemies with a melee strike.

bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
bloodthirst.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Every kill you get will increase your next melee attack damage by 100%, up to a maximum of 500%. This effect gets reset when you kill an enemy with a melee attack.
ACE: 4 points	Whenever you kill an enemy with a melee attack, you will gain a 50% increase in reload speed for 10 seconds.

pumping_iron.name: Pumping Iron
pumping_iron.description:
BASIC: 2 points	Your melee reswing speed is 100% faster.
ACE: 4 points	Your melee attacks deal 50% more damage.

counterstrike.name: Counterstrike
counterstrike.description:
BASIC: 3 points	You can now sprint with melee weapons.
ACE: 6 points	You can now knock down bulldozers with melee. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description:
BASIC: 3 points	The lower your health, the more movement speed you gain. When your health is below 50%, you will gain up to 20% movement speed.
ACE: 6 points	The lower your health, the more damage you do. When your health is below 50%, you will do up to 250% more melee and saw damage.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description:
BASIC: 4 points	You only get 10% of your maximum health and cannot heal above it but you take 15% less damage and healing received is reduced by 75%.
ACE: 8 points	Damage taken is now reduced by 35% and healing received is reduced by 0%.
